allocationId.description: The allocation ID. This is required for EC2-VPC.

allowReassociation.description:
Whether to allow an Elastic IP to
be re-associated. Defaults to `true` in VPC.

instanceId.description:
The ID of the instance. This is required for
EC2-Classic. For EC2-VPC, you can specify either the instance ID or the
network interface ID, but not both. The operation fails if you specify an
instance ID unless exactly one network interface is attached.

networkInterfaceId.description:
The ID of the network interface. If the
instance has more than one network interface, you must specify a network
interface ID.

privateIpAddress.description:
The primary or secondary private IP address
to associate with the Elastic IP address. If no private IP address is
specified, the Elastic IP address is associated with the primary private IP
address.

publicIp.description: The Elastic IP address. This is required for EC2-Classic.
